article_text: Governor calls for audit of state’s mental healthcare facilities to examine patient care, safety and security. A pilot program also will be used to develop a statewide model of coordinated care.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Florida, mental health, behavioral health, mental illness, Rick Scott, Medicaid, uninsured, healthcare

article_metadata.title: Gov. Rick Scott expands executive order to review, coordinate Florida mental health services | Miami Herald

article_summary:
Governor calls for audit of state’s mental healthcare facilities to examine patient care, safety and security.
A pilot program also will be used to develop a statewide model of coordinated care.
